page.title: 19SHOPS
page.content: In Porthleven there are all kinds of shops although it is a small village. There are three butcher shops,.three supermarkets, two chip shops and two wet fish shops. We have two small corner shops, two newsagents, five gifts shops for tourists and an angling centre, a diving centre and a Chandlers. There is also a pottery and a forge making wrought iron gifts. We have several general stores, one baker's shop, one chemist and two greengrocers. There is also a second hand shop and two clothes shops, one of which sells wool. We also have a Handy Man's shop and a Building Supplies Store. There is an Estate Agent, a Post Office and two banks, Lloyds and Barclays, which only open a few mornings a week.
